CM.name: Message-Based Cost
CM.description: Cost for IoT message ingestion services (e.g., AWS IoT Core, Azure IoT Hub).

N_m.description: Total number of messages sent during billing period

CE.name: Execution-Based Cost
CE.description: Serverless function pricing combining per-request and per-duration (GB-second) charges.

freeRequests.description: Free requests included per billing period

c_t.description: Cost per GB-second of compute time

freeComputeTime.description: Free compute time in GB-seconds per month

CA.name: Action-Based Cost
CA.description: Cost for metered API operations, database reads/writes, or queries.

c_a.description: Unit price per action (e.g., API call, read, write)

N_a.description: Total number of actions during billing period

CS.name: Storage-Based Cost
CS.description: Storage cost proportional to data volume and duration.

D.description: Duration of storage in months (usually 1 for monthly billing)

CU.name: User-Based Cost
CU.description: Cost for user-licensed services (e.g., dashboards or analytics workspaces).

c_u.description: Cost per user per billing period

N_u.description: Number of active users in the period

CTransfer.name: Data Transfer Cost
CTransfer.description: Data transfer or egress cost between layers or providers.

c_transfer.description: Price per GB transferred out of the provider

GB_transferred.description: Total GB transferred between cloud layers or across providers
